package.name: SeeYa
package.shortDescription: Compatible with: Every iOS device. iOS 12.0 and newer.

descriptionlist.description: Shows WhatsApp chat profile photo instead of the app logo in notifications. Works for WhatsApp, WhatsApp Business, and support to more apps will be added soon.

changelog.change: Fixed a bug where the tweak won't work until it is manually disabled and enabled from the preferences.
Fixed a compatibility issues with SnowBoard.
SeeYa now works on iOS 12 as well!
